idea-plugin.name: Paste with Pastie
idea-plugin.description: Plugin which allows you to share selected code fragment using http://pastie.org service. It automatically detects language of selected fragment and then copies link to Pastie.org to your clipboard. Sent code is marked as private so anyone without link shouldn't be able to access it.
idea-plugin.change-notes: • 0.2 Added plugin project page, contact email, etc.
